participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and nurturing, she juggles responsibilities with grace and a touch of humor.
participant_1.background: I am raising my kids on my own. I am a psychology major. I am too short to reach the top shelf. I am angry at my coworker. My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and creative, he enjoys the simple things in life like cooking and spending time with his pet.
participant_2.background: I love to cook and try new recipes, but I usually end up making campfire stew because it's my favorite. I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time. I prefer summer. I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer. The idea of working is not my cup of tea.

content.text: Hey there, I am a psychology major and am raising my kids on my own.
Hey there, that must be tough. I am not a parent but I have a parrot named Todd.
I love parrots! I have a dog and a cat.
That is great, I love summer and campfire stew is my favorite.
I love summer too. I am angry at my coworker.
I love cooking but I am too short to reach the top shelf.
I love cooking too. I am treating my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
That is so sweet of you.
Thanks, you seem like a really cool person.
